GuideLines

These Guidelines are being issued as per sub-section (4) of section 3 of the Act. As per the provisions of the Act, a farmer may enter into a Farming Agreement for the sale of any farming produce before the actual production takes place. The agreement should cover all the relevant aspects related to parties, product, price, delivery mechanism and conciliation process
